headline: 5 Revealing Analyst Questions From Old Dominion Freight Line’s Q3 Earnings Call
summary: Old Dominion Freight Line’s third quarter results reflected the ongoing softness in U.S. freight demand, with management citing a continued decline in shipment volumes as the primary factor weighing on financial performance. The company’s leadership highlighted that average daily tonnage fell 9% year over year, offset to some extent by improvements in pricing and operational efficiency.
